planet.name: Kepler-60 b
KOI 2086.01
KID 6768394
planet.description: This planet candidate was discovered by the Kepler spacecraft. It transits its host star every 7.13 days for 4.1519 hours. Periodic transit timing variations confirm its planetary nature.
